channel.title: Comments on: Boodle – A stolen iPhone locator
channel.description: Intermediate in flow properties between solids and liquids; highly viscous.

item.title: By: vikram2010
item.dc:creator: vikram2010
item.description: If your Iphone is lost or stolen and you still have the IMEI code these guys should be able to help you track your Iphone with IMEI: https://www.facebook.com/Iphonetrace and their main website http://www.iphonetrace.com/
item.content:encoded:
If your Iphone is lost or stolen and you still have the IMEI code these guys should be able to help you track your Iphone with IMEI:
https://www.facebook.com/Iphonetrace and their main website http://www.iphonetrace.com/

item.title: By: Karanjit Sidhu
item.dc:creator: Karanjit Sidhu
item.description:
Hey.. This is FW1.x code.. any idea where i can lay my hands ont he fw2.x ported utils.. All these utils are not available in fw2.x which is kinda breaking the fix.
Thanks.
item.content:encoded:
Hey.. This is FW1.x code.. any idea where i can lay my hands ont he fw2.x ported utils.. All these utils are not available in fw2.x which is kinda breaking the fix.

Thanks.

item.title: By: Shaarangapanaye
item.dc:creator: Shaarangapanaye
item.description: Wow! Thank you! I always wanted to write in my site something like that. Can I take part of your post to my blog?
item.content:encoded: Wow! Thank you! I always wanted to write in my site something like that. Can I take part of your post to my blog?

item.title: By: dsuchter

item.description: I agree - 3G aka 2.x-firmware-friendly would be great.

item.title: By: elr0y7
item.dc:creator: elr0y7
item.description: Don't ask him, ask erica, its her utility that uses the phone's location technology.
item.content:encoded: Don’t ask him, ask erica, its her utility that uses the phone’s location technology.

item.title: By: Louis Loizides
item.dc:creator: Louis Loizides
item.description: Great script! Any plans to update this for the IPhone 3G w/ GPS?
item.content:encoded: Great script! Any plans to update this for the IPhone 3G w/ GPS?
